author: CoffeeBrickMan
title: Quick Mini Review
review:
Kamzo is the third of the Series 5 Mixels of the Klinkers Tribe.

He has a compact form, and quite a menacing expression (his eyes can be rotated to different angles), he's got cogs for ears, and his big right hand also rotates on a mini turntable.

He can hold a Nixel in his big hand, and give it a good spin.

As with the other Klinkers, he has a good selection of gold, silver and brown pieces, a few ball&socket joints, 2 cogs and axles, and a mini turntable.

Quick build time a little under 3½ minutes.

Kamzo is a great and fun addition to this tribe.

Klinker Max

This Max (a combination of the 3 members of the tribe) is really cool, and has, I think, a first for the Mixels - a cog drive articulation. Turn the axle handle on his back, and his shoulders rotate (in opposite directions) waving his multi articulated arms around. Each of his hands has 4 fingers, with an extra finger opposite the 3 (as Gox), which allows Klinker Max to get a hold of thinks, such as a couple of Nixels.

One of my favourite Max's

Quick build time 6½ minutes, There are a fair number of parts left over, enough to give him double articulated legs as well as his double articulated arms.
